main event: A bright white object with occasional red flashes was observed by a witness. The object hovered for about 1 minute and then moved slowly out of sight.
interesting points: The object was about the size of a silver dollar.
The object was called in to the observer by an unidentified person over the phone.
The object was almost directly overhead as seen by the observer.
The observer had to leave to go to their job before the object disappeared.
The Air Force officer investigating the case suspected the object was a homemade hot air balloon.
sighted object: a bright white object with occasional red flashes
witnesses: a deputy sheriff and radio operator
